javadoc:
Tool manager that knows about all the running tools for each workspace
 in the project; the tool manager is responsible for launching new tools,
 and managing connections among tools.

methods.javadoc: creates a tool manager for the project
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: creates a tool manager for the project

methods.javadoc: saves this object to an XML element.
methods.name: saveToXml
methods.comment: saves this object to an XML element.

methods.javadoc:
restores the object from an XML element
@param root root element of saved XML state
methods.name: restoreFromXml
methods.comment: restores the object from an XML element

params.name: root
params.comment: root element of saved XML state

methods.javadoc:
Return whether any tools have changed, or if any tools were
 added or removed from any of the workspaces.
methods.name: hasChanged
methods.comment:
Return whether any tools have changed, or if any tools were
 added or removed from any of the workspaces.

methods.javadoc: Close all running tools in the project.
methods.name: close
methods.comment: Close all running tools in the project.

methods.javadoc:
Save the tools that are opened and changed, that will be brought back up when the project
 is reopened.
methods.name: saveSessionTools
methods.comment:
Save the tools that are opened and changed, that will be brought back up when the project
 is reopened.

methods.javadoc: Debug method for printing out the list of connections.
methods.name: dumpConnectionList
methods.comment: Debug method for printing out the list of connections.

methods.javadoc:
Clear the flag so the user does not get prompted to save the
 project; flag gets set to true when a workspace is created, and
 a workspace is created when a new project is created.
methods.name: clearWorkspaceChanged
methods.comment:
Clear the flag so the user does not get prompted to save the
 project; flag gets set to true when a workspace is created, and
 a workspace is created when a new project is created.

methods.javadoc:
Get any toolservices available from this tool.
@return ToolServices list of tool services this tool can provide.
methods.name: getToolServices
methods.comment: Get any toolservices available from this tool.

return.comment: ToolServices list of tool services this tool can provide.

methods.javadoc: Called by WorkspaceImpl when it is restoring its state.
methods.name: getTool
methods.comment: Called by WorkspaceImpl when it is restoring its state.

methods.javadoc:
Remove all connection objects for the given tool.
@param tool
methods.name: disconnectTool
methods.comment: Remove all connection objects for the given tool.

name: ToolManagerImpl
comment:
Tool manager that knows about all the running tools for each workspace
 in the project; the tool manager is responsible for launching new tools,
 and managing connections among tools.
